axe-chrome-debugging-protocol-example

This (very minimal) example demonstrates how to use axe-core with the Chrome Debugging Protocol.

The example does not have feature parity with axe-webdriverjs, and does not run on <iframe>s.

To run the example

  • Ensure Node v8+ is installed and on PATH
  • Move to the doc/examples/chrome-debugging-protocol directory
  • Run npm install
  • Run google-chrome --headless --remote-debugging-port=9222. If you donâ€™t have a google-chrome binary, you can alias one with alias google-chrome='/Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome' on OSX.
  • Run node axe-cdp.js http://www.deque.com to run axe-core via Puppeteer against http://www.deque.com and output results to the terminal
